titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade for each of 4 vessels.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 6/20/1996--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue certificates of documentation for four named vessels for employment in the coastwise trade.
